DOC.brief_summary: The aim overall project investigate potential combination commercially available nutraceuticals produce Marigot Ltd ( natural seawater derive mineral-rich AquaminMG seaweed-derived mineral-rich food supplement AquaminTM ( FDA GRAS 000028 ) isolate Lithothamnion specie ) , safe effective supplement promote cognition age brain .
DOC.criteria: To consider eligible enrolment study , subject must ; 1 . Be able give write informed consent . 2 . Be 65 85 year age ( elderly cohort ) . 3 . If female , must nonpregnant . 4 . Be generally good health determine investigator . Subjects exclude study meet criterion ; 1 . Are less 65 great 85 year age ( elderly cohort ) . 2 . Are pregnant female . 3 . Are currently take calcium/magnesium supplement , take past 14 day . 4 . Have significant acute chronic coexist illness ( cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , endocrinological , immunological , metabolic condition contraindicates , investigator judgement , entry study ) . 5 . Have score < 22 Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) ( elderly cohort ) subjective memory impairment . 6 . Have history renal failure renal disease , eGFR creatinine level 30ml/min . 7 . Have diagnosis significant low high calcium magnesium level . 8 . Have condition take medication investigator believe would interfere objective study , pose safety risk confound interpretation study result ; include misoprostrol , polystyrene sulfonate , Riociguat vitamin/mineral supplement , probiotic herbal remedy . 9 . Are individual , opinion investigator , consider poor attendee unlikely reason able comply trial . 10 . Are receive treatment involve experimental drug . 11 . Have recent experimental trial , must complete less 30 day prior study . 12 . Have malignant disease concomitant endstage organ disease . 13 . Have psychiatric illness contraindicates entry study .
